summary: Risk, Basel II, and Actuarial Consulting - Founded in 2003, Alchemy has grown to be one of the largest Enterprise risk and Actuarial firms in the region with a portfolio of several blue chip customers. Alchemy’s enterprise and Basel II risk solution, Alchemy Risk Manager has been built with feedback from International and local industry user groups. Our services include hosted implementation, enterprise risk consulting, actuarial advisory and training services.
